remixlab.fpstiming

Interface Animator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractScene, AnimatorObject, Scene

    public interface Animator
    Interface defining the behavior animated objects should implement.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void animate()
      Main call back animated method.
      long animationPeriod()
      Returns the animation period in milliseconds.
      boolean animationStarted()
      Returns true if animation was started and false otherwise.
      boolean invokeAnimationHandler()
      Returns whether or not the animated method is defined externally, as when register it through reflection.
      boolean isAnimationStarted()
      Deprecated. 
      Please refrain from using this method, it will be removed from future releases.
      void restartAnimation()
      Simply calls stopAnimation() and then startAnimation().
      void setAnimationPeriod(long period)
      Sets the animation period in milliseconds.
      void setAnimationPeriod(long period, boolean restart)
      Sets the animation period in milliseconds and restarts the animation according to restart.
      void setTimingHandler(TimingHandler h)
      Sets the timing handler.
      void startAnimation()
      Starts the animation executing periodically the animated call back method.
      void stopAnimation()
      Stops the animation.
      SeqTimer timer()
      Returns the sequential timer.
      TimingHandler timingHandler()
      Returns the timing handler.
      void toggleAnimation()
      Starts or stops the animation according to animationStarted().

    • Method Detail

      • animate

        void animate()
        Main call back animated method.

      • invokeAnimationHandler

        boolean invokeAnimationHandler()
        Returns whether or not the animated method is defined externally, as when register it through reflection.

      • animationPeriod

        long animationPeriod()
        Returns the animation period in milliseconds.

      • setAnimationPeriod

        void setAnimationPeriod(long period)
        Sets the animation period in milliseconds.

      • setAnimationPeriod

        void setAnimationPeriod(long period,
                      boolean restart)
        Sets the animation period in milliseconds and restarts the animation according to restart.

      • stopAnimation

        void stopAnimation()
        Stops the animation.

      • startAnimation

        void startAnimation()
        Starts the animation executing periodically the animated call back method.

      • restartAnimation

        void restartAnimation()
        Simply calls stopAnimation() and then startAnimation().

      • toggleAnimation

        void toggleAnimation()
        Starts or stops the animation according to animationStarted().

      • animationStarted

        boolean animationStarted()
        Returns true if animation was started and false otherwise.

      • isAnimationStarted

        @Deprecated
boolean isAnimationStarted()
        Deprecated. Please refrain from using this method, it will be removed from future releases.
        Use animationStarted() instead.

      • setTimingHandler

        void setTimingHandler(TimingHandler h)
        Sets the timing handler.

      • timingHandler

        TimingHandler timingHandler()
        Returns the timing handler.

        Returns the sequential timer.
